ValidationRule.description: Quantities cannot be changed in renewals. Adjustments must be made with upsell/downsell opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($User.LastName, "Bypass")), NOT(Allow_Product_Merge__c)=TRUE, NOT(ISCHANGED(Item_Start_Date__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Item_End_Date__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Term__c)), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type,"Existing Business-Renewal"), NOT(Contains($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), ISCHANGED(Quantity))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Product quantities cannot be edited in a renewal. Please use an upsell/downsell opportunity to make adjustments. For queries, contact Mandy Van Rijn.
